entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness near noon. 30 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Rain or snow beginning in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming north 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 10 April 2023
